org.pipservices3.components.trace.ITracer

Description
org.pipservices3.components.trace
 

  • Uses of ITracer in org.pipservices3.components.trace

    Classes in org.pipservices3.components.trace that implement ITracer
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    CachedTracer
    Abstract tracer that caches recorded traces in memory and periodically dumps them.
    class 
    CompositeTracer
    Aggregates all tracers from component references under a single component.
    class 
    LogTracer
    Tracer that dumps recorded traces to logger. ### Configuration parameters ### - options: - log_level: log level to record traces (default: debug) ### References ### *:logger:*:*:1.0 (optional) ILogger components to dump the captured counters *:context-info:*:*:1.0 (optional) ContextInfo to detect the context id and specify counters source
    class 
    NullTracer
    Dummy implementation of tracer that doesn't do anything.
